ygData.msgSnippet: The blasts hit eachother. The impact didnt affect either bot. They launched at each other. Magnus held his sword and Galvatron pulled the flame sword. They

Subject: Ancient rivalry

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Robert Thomas <Kinger1984@...>

 The blasts hit eachother. The impact didnt affect
either bot. They launched at each other. Magnus held
his sword and Galvatron pulled the flame sword. They
struck. Both sent equal blows. Galvatron took a slice
across the chest whil Magnus took a deep gash in the
arm. Galvatron took hold of Magnus's arms and bit into
his shoulder. His fire energy realased destroying and
seperateing his right arm. Magnus at the same time
sliced his sword right through Galvatrons right leg
cutting off smoothly. The two retreated back wards.
Galvatrons healed over and stopped the bleeding while
magnus still bled. he transformed into the truck. The
panel came down shooting rapid shot of about 100
bullets. They hit Galvatron many times. Galvatron in a
desperate move shot off his energy blast from both his
hands. Takeing out a section of Magnus's left ribs.
The two where in horrible shape. Magnus tranformed
back to robot mode. the bleeding had stopped. That was
round one. Round two was soon to be finished.
